name: Malaria
reply: Malaria is a mosquito-borne infectious disease. Common symptoms include fever, chills, headache, and muscle pain. Please consult a doctor for proper treatment.

name: Dengue
reply: Dengue is caused by a virus transmitted by mosquitoes. Symptoms include high fever, severe headache, joint pain, and rash. Seek medical advice immediately.

name: Common Cold
reply: Common cold is a viral infection of the upper respiratory tract. Symptoms include sneezing, runny nose, sore throat, and cough. Rest and fluids help recovery.

name: Flu
reply: Influenza is a contagious viral infection that affects the respiratory system. Symptoms include fever, chills, muscle aches, fatigue, and cough. Consult your healthcare provider for proper care.

name: COVID-19
reply: COVID-19 is a viral respiratory illness caused by the coronavirus. Symptoms include fever, dry cough, fatigue, and loss of taste or smell. Follow safety guidelines and consult a doctor if needed.

name: Hypertension
reply: Hypertension is a condition where blood pressure is consistently too high. It may lead to heart problems. Regular monitoring, a balanced diet, and exercise can help manage it. Consult a doctor for proper treatment.

name: Diabetes
reply: Diabetes is a chronic condition where the body cannot regulate blood sugar levels effectively. Symptoms include excessive thirst, frequent urination, and fatigue. Proper medication and lifestyle changes are important.

name: Asthma
reply: Asthma is a respiratory condition that causes inflammation and narrowing of airways. Symptoms include shortness of breath, wheezing, and coughing. Avoid triggers and follow prescribed treatment.

name: Migraine
reply: Migraine is a neurological condition characterized by intense headaches, often with nausea and sensitivity to light or sound. Managing stress and medication can help. Consult a doctor.

name: Anemia
reply: Anemia is a condition where the blood lacks enough healthy red blood cells. Symptoms include fatigue, weakness, and pale skin. Iron-rich foods and supplements can help treat it.

name: Allergy
reply: Allergies occur when the immune system overreacts to harmless substances. Common symptoms include sneezing, itching, and skin irritation. Avoid allergens and consult a doctor for treatment.

name: Arthritis
reply: Arthritis causes inflammation in the joints, leading to pain and stiffness. Regular exercise, a healthy diet, and medications can alleviate symptoms. Consult a healthcare provider.

name: Heart Disease
reply: Heart disease includes various conditions affecting the heart. Symptoms may include chest pain, shortness of breath, and fatigue. Early diagnosis and lifestyle changes are essential.

name: Kidney Stones
reply: Kidney stones are hard deposits of minerals and salts that form in the kidneys. They can cause severe pain and difficulty urinating. Drink plenty of water and seek medical advice.

name: Thyroid Disorder
reply: Thyroid disorders affect hormone regulation in the body. Symptoms include fatigue, weight changes, and mood swings. Blood tests can confirm diagnosis and proper medication helps.

name: Skin Infection
reply: Skin infections are caused by bacteria, viruses, or fungi. Symptoms include redness, itching, and sores. Maintain hygiene and consult a healthcare provider for proper treatment.

name: Stomach Ulcer
reply: Stomach ulcers are open sores that develop on the stomach lining. Symptoms include burning pain, bloating, and nausea. Avoid spicy foods and consult a doctor for treatment.

name: Depression
reply: Depression is a mood disorder that causes persistent feelings of sadness and loss of interest. Therapy, medication, and support can help manage symptoms. Seek professional help.

name: Anxiety
reply: Anxiety is a feeling of worry or fear that can interfere with daily activities. Deep breathing, relaxation techniques, and counseling can help. Talk to a healthcare professional.
